title: Mifepristone: US judge halts approval for abortion pill
description: US judge halts approval for commonly used abortion pill mifepristone, but gives government a week to appeal.

title: Masters 2023: Rory McIlroy set to miss cut as Brooks Koepka leads at Augusta
description: Rory McIlroy's dreams of landing the Masters look to be over this year after a stormy day at Augusta saw fans avoid injury from falling trees.

title: Masters play suspended as trees fall close to crowd
description: Play is suspended on day two of the Masters after trees fall across the 17th tee at Augusta because of storms.

title: Middlesbrough 1-2 Burnley: Vincent Kompany's Clarets win promotion to Premier League
description: Vincent Kompany's Burnley secure promotion back to the Premier League at the first attempt with a victory over Middlesbrough.

title: 'You can't train in a zoo then go to the jungle' - Arteta on Anfield preparation
description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta expects the atmosphere away to Liverpool on Sunday to be like a "jungle".

title: Masters 2023: Tiger Woods, Cameron Smith & Viktor Hovland in best shots of day two
description: Tiger Woods, Cameron Smith and Viktor Hovland star in the best shots of day two at the Masters where play was suspended early after trees fell due to stormy weather at the Augusta National in Georgia.

title: Heineken Champions Cup: Leinster 55-24 Leicester Tigers - Leinster into semi-finals
description: Leinster score seven tries against Leicester to become the first side into this season's Heineken Champions Cup semi-finals.

title: Masters 2023: Rahm hits back-to-back birdies to keep in touch with Koepka
description: Jon Rahm birdies the eight and ninth holes to move within three shots of clubhouse leader Brooks Koepka on day two of the Masters.

title: Hull earn draw with last kick in eight-goal thriller at Sunderland
description: Ozan Tufan's last-gasp penalty earns Hull City a point in an eight-goal thriller at Sunderland to dent the hosts' Championship play-off ambitions.

title: Dice roll settles tie in small Wisconsin town election
description: A dice roll instead of a coin flip was considered the fairest as both sides can participate.

title: Anthony Joshua: British heavyweight says he will be back in the ring within next three months
description: British heavyweight Anthony Joshua says he will not leave it as long as nine months for his next fight after his recent win over Jermaine Franklin.

title: Paul Cattermole: Look back at S Club 7 singer's life
description: S Club 7 were one of the biggest acts of the early 2000s and had announced a comeback tour.

title: Super League: Wigan Warriors 14-6 St Helens - Champions beaten in fierce derby
description: Wigan come out on top of Super League champions St Helens to win a bruising, thrilling derby before a crowd of 24,275.

title: Evan Gershkovich: Russia charges US journalist with spying - reports
description: Evan Gershkovich, who was arrested last week, categorically rejects the accusations, reports say.

title: Sheff Utd beat Wigan to boost promotion bid
description: Sheffield United move closer to securing promotion back to the Premier League with a win over struggling Wigan Athletic.

title: Carrington: Several roads closed due to 'ongoing incident'
description: Officers are investigating after a call saying a suspicious package was inside a property.

title: Supreme Court's Clarence Thomas defends luxury trips
description: It follows a report that said Clarence Thomas benefited from the hospitality of a billionaire.

title: Two Israeli women killed in West Bank shooting attack
description: The sisters were driving in a car in the Jordan Valley with their mother, who was seriously injured.

title: Paul Cattermole: S Club 7 star dies aged 46
description: The pop group, who announced a reunion in February, say they are "truly devastated" at his death.

title: Bob Lee killing highlights San Francisco crime fears
description: The deadly stabbing of Cash App founder sparks doubt and pessimism over future of famous US city.

title: Millwall and Luton draw to leave Burnley on brink of promotion
description: Championship play-off hopefuls Millwall and Luton Town share the points after an uninspiring draw at the Den.

title: Australia 0-1 Scotland: Docherty stunner earns Scots victory
description: Claire Emslie will captain Scotland in the absence of Rachel Corsie in Friday's friendly against Australia on London.

title: Russian rouble falls to lowest value for a year
description: The currency tumbles against the dollar as Western sanctions continue.

title: Laura Benanti: Actress says she went on stage while having miscarriage
description: Broadway star Laura Benanti says she knew it was happening before performing for 2,000 people.

title: Beckton blaze: Boy, 16, arrested after girl dies in flat fire
description: A teenager is held on suspicion of murder after a 14-year-old girl dies in east London.

title: SNP auditors quit after police search Peter Murrell's home
description: The SNP is required by law to audit its accounts and has to provide a report for 2022 by 7 July.

title: Masters 2023: Untidy opening round tested patience, says Rory McIlroy
description: Northern Ireland's Rory McIlroy admits his "untidy" round of 72 tested his patience on day one of the 2023 Masters.

title: Stormy Daniels: Trump doesn't deserve prison for hush money
description: The adult film actress says she felt sadness when seeing the former US president in court this week.

title: People were taking drugs in Spain 3,000 years ago, study finds
description: A new study finds people in Menorca got high on hallucinogenic drugs during the Bronze Age.

title: Sheffield: Boy, 12, charged with murder of woman hit by car
description: The boy is charged with the murder of 60-year-old Marcia Grant who died in Sheffield.

title: John Lydon's wife Nora Forster dies from Alzheimer's at 80

title: Celtic v Rangers: Michael Beale takes on Ange Postecoglou in Old Firm derby
description: Rangers boss Michael Beale must conjure a plan to end the "merciless consistency" of Ange Postecoglou's Celtic, says BBC Scotland’s chief sports writer Tom English.

title: Sheffield: Woman hit by car named after boy, 12, arrested
description: Marcia Grant, 60, is described as a "warm, loving" pillar of her community.

title: European Gymnastics Championships: Becky Downie says selection is 'a step in the right direction'
description: Two-time Olympian Becky Downie says her selection for the European Championships is a "step in the right direction" after recovering from injury.

description: Israel's military says it has hit targets linked to Palestinian militant group Hamas.

title: Covid origins: Chinese scientists publish long-awaited data

title: The Elms: Whittlesey care home's chaotic final days
description: A coroner describes three bereaved families' campaign over poor care as "remarkable".

title: Tennessee statehouse expels Democrats for gun control protest
description: The lawmakers took part in an anti-gun protest following a school mass shooting in the state.

title: Body of Newbold teenager missing since February found in quarry

title: Coolio: Gangsta's Paradise rapper died of fentanyl overdose - manager

title: PSNI chief warns of dissident republican disorder during Easter
